info.title: Cmdop API
info.description: Complete API documentation for Django CFG Demo Project

post.description: Create new API key (raw key shown only once).

get.description:
ViewSet for ApiKey operations.

Manage API keys for workspace integrations.
Note: Raw key is only shown once during creation.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this API Key.

post.description: User approves or denies device code in browser (requires authentication).
CLI initiates OAuth flow by requesting a device code and user code.
Revoke access token or refresh token.
CLI polls for token (device flow) or refreshes expired token.

get.description: Get information about current access token (requires authentication).
List all CLI tokens for authenticated user.

ApiKey.description: Read-only serializer for ApiKey (hides actual key).

name.title: Key name
name.description: Descriptive name for this API key

ApiKeyCreateRequest.description: Serializer for creating new API key.

name.description: Descriptive name for this API key

ApiKeyResponse.description: Response serializer that includes raw key (shown only once).

name.title: Key name
name.description: Descriptive name for this API key

DeviceAuthorizeRequest.description:
Request body for POST /api/oauth/authorize

User approves or denies device code in browser.

action.description:
User decision: approve or deny

* `approve` - approve
* `deny` - deny

workspace_id.description: Workspace ID to grant access to (required for approve)

DeviceCodeRequestRequest.description:
Request body for POST /api/oauth/device

Client sends metadata about itself.

DeviceCodeResponse.description:
Response body for POST /api/oauth/device

Returns device code info for CLI to display to user.

device_code.description: Device code for polling (not shown to user)

user_code.description: Human-readable code to show user (e.g., ABC-XYZ)

count.description: Total number of items across all pages

has_next.description: Whether there is a next page

has_previous.description: Whether there is a previous page

next_page.description: Next page number (null if no next page)

previous_page.description: Previous page number (null if no previous page)

results.description: Array of items for current page

* `machine_offline` - Machine Offline
* `task_failed` - Task Failed
* `schedule_error` - Schedule Error
type.title: Alert type

TokenError.description:
Error response for POST /api/oauth/token

OAuth 2.0 standard error format.

error.description:
OAuth error code

* `authorization_pending` - authorization_pending
* `slow_down` - slow_down
* `access_denied` - access_denied
* `expired_token` - expired_token
* `invalid_grant` - invalid_grant

TokenInfo.description:
Response for GET /api/oauth/token/info

Returns information about current token.

last_used_at.description: Last time access token was used

TokenList.description: Serializer for listing user's CLI tokens.

last_used_at.description: Last time access token was used

TokenRequestRequest.description:
Request body for POST /api/oauth/token

CLI polls with device_code until approved.

grant_type.description:
OAuth grant type

* `urn:ietf:params:oauth:grant-type:device_code` - Device Code Flow
* `refresh_token` - Refresh Token

device_code.description: Device code from initial request (for device flow)

TokenResponse.description:
Response body for POST /api/oauth/token

Returns access token and refresh token.

TokenRevokeRequest.description:
Request body for POST /api/oauth/revoke

Revoke access token or refresh token.

token_type_hint.description:
Hint about token type (optional)

* `access_token` - access_token
* `refresh_token` - refresh_token
